description:
The Meta Quest 3 is a virtual reality headset manufactured by Meta. It was released in October 2023, following an announcement in June 2023. It is the company's 2nd VR headset release.
- This headset is standalone and does not require a PC to use.
- This headset has a high per-eye resolution. 2064x2208
- This headset has a high refresh rate. 120 Hz
- This headset has a high horizontal field of view. 110Â°
- This headset does not require external base stations.
- This headset can be purchased with two 6DoF controllers.
The Meta Quest 3 is Meta's successor to the Meta Quest 2 (formerly known as the Oculus Quest 2).

Meta Quest 3 (also referred to under the codenames "Stinson" and "Eureka") features an improved design over the Quest 2, making use of pancake optics to reduce the device's profile and improve comfort for the wearer.

The Meta Quest 3 is the first Meta headset to make use of the Snapdragon XR2 Gen 2 chipset, making it significantly more powerful than both the Quest 2 and the Quest Pro, while being priced significantly cheaper than the Quest Pro.
Meta Quest Touch Plus Controllers, sold alongside the headset

faq.question: When was Meta Quest 3 released?
faq.answer: Meta Quest 3 was released on October 10th, 2023, following an announcement on June 1st, 2023.

faq.question: How much does Meta Quest 3 cost?
faq.answer: Meta Quest 3, complete with controllers can be purchased for $499.

faq.question: What is the resolution of Meta Quest 3?
faq.answer: Meta Quest 3 has a resolution of 2064x2208 per-eye, totalling approximately 4.56 million pixels per-eye, or 9.11 million pixels overall.

faq.question: What is the FoV of Meta Quest 3?
faq.answer: Meta Quest 3 has an estimated horizontal field of view of 110 degrees. The vertical field of view of Meta Quest 3 is estimated to be 96 degrees. The diagonal FoV of Meta Quest 3 is not yet known.

faq.question: Does Meta Quest 3 have hand tracking?
faq.answer: Meta Quest 3 supports hand and body tracking.

faq.question: Does Meta Quest 3 have eye tracking?
faq.answer: Meta Quest 3 does not support eye tracking.
